text: The Tomb of Artaxerxes is a Catacombs located in Marvdasht.This Tomb is part of the Naqsh-e Rostam And This is Artaxerxes I's Tomb. == Gallery == File:Ka'ba-ye Zartosht and Achaemenid Tombs, Naqsh-E Rostam, Iran (10059043064).jpg File:Rostam inscription - Naghsh Rostam - panoramio (2).jpg File:Naghsh-e rostam, Irán, 2016-09-24, DD 13.jpg File:Tombs of Artaxerxes I and Darius I, with Sassanid-era bas-reliefs below - Naqsh-e Rustam, Iran.jpg File:Tomb of Artaxerxes I, Naqsh-e Rustam.jpg File:201312 iran Shiraz 52 (12476251815).jpg File:Artaxerxes I image.png File:Artaxerxes I at Naqsh-e Rostam.jpg ==Sources== Category:Naqsh-e Rustam Category:Achaemenid architecture Category:Tourist attractions in Fars Province Category:Mausoleums in Iran Category:Buildings and structures in Fars Province
title: Tomb of Artaxerxes I of Persia
